roleset.name: paperwork, seek, claim, call for
roleset.note: FILE-V NOTES: Member of VNcls pocket-9.10. (from file.01-v)

FILE-V NOTES: The difference between this and file.01 is that in this case the paperwork cannot be mentioned. With the roleset (file.01) above, the paperwork need not be mentioned, but can be. (from file.02-v)
FILE-N NOTES: Based on verb entries file.01 and file.02, which can be combined. Corresponds to VNcls pocket-9.10. (from file.01-n)
FILING-N NOTES: Corresponds to VNcls pocket-9.10. (from filing.01-n)

example.name: file-v: active
example.text: [David Dinkins]-1 failed *trace*-1 to file his income taxes.

example.name: file-v: lawsuit
example.text: University Patents filed a suit in federal court in Philadelphia.

example.name: file-v: passivized
example.text: Documents-1 filed *trace*-1 with the Securities and Exchange Commission on the pending spinoff...
example.arg: with the Securities and Exchange Commission

example.name: file-v: with purpose
example.text: A group of investors filed with federal antitrust regulators for clearance to buy more than 50% of the stock of Rally's Inc.
example.arg: for clearance to buy more than 50% of the stock of Rally's Inc

example.name: file-v
example.text: One or more airlines have filed for protection from creditors.

example.name: filing-n: within LVC
example.text: When-1 the required Hart-Scott-Rodino filing eventually was made , it did n't disclose the group 's alleged earlier violation of the so-called prior-notice requirements of the law *T*-1.

example.name: filing-n: Args 0, 1, 3
example.text: Squitieri& Fearon, LLP announced their filing of a securities suit against Bankof America Corp.

example.name: filing-n: Args 0, 1, 2
example.text: They refused to promote Walters because of her gender and terminated her in retaliation for her filing of discrimination charges with the EEOC.

example.name: filing-n: with purpose
example.text: Billy Ray Cyrus withdraws his filing for divorce.

roleset.name: walk in a straight line
roleset.note: FILE-V NOTES: Member of VNcls run-51.3.2. (from file.03-v)

example.name: gorgeous british slang
example.text: A stream of tire-kickers and lookee-loos had filed through since.
example.arg: A stream of tire-kickers and lookee-loos
